features: ✅ KN95 Face Mask - Keep your mouth, nose, and chin covered and protected when you go to crowded and enclosed public places. Dolce Calma KN95 face masks are good for transport drivers, taxi drivers, police, security personnel, media reporters, couriers, etc because they interact with a large number of people. With it's fixed metal nose clip inside the mask you do not need to worry that the inserted nose clip will fall off. Besides, the flexible metal nose clip makes it easier to fit

✅【Disposable Masks 】Wear the Multicolor KN95 face masks when you travel through congested airports, bus terminals, malls, party and busy city streets. Creates a tight seal and stops glasses from fogging. Masks are disposable and cannot be washed. Disclaimer: This KN95 mask is NOT an N95 mask. For more information about KN95 masks please see the following before you purchase: amazon.com/AboutKN95s.

✅【Comfortable and Hygienic】This box is perfect for the family which includes 25 Individually Wrapped KN95 Face Masks with 5 quantities of each color: Pink, Light Blue, Royal Blue, Maroon, and Gray. Lightweight and foldable, easy to carry, and hygienic to use. Equipped with an adjustable soft-padded nose clip and elastic ear hooks to prevent leaving marks on your face after taking it off.

✅【5-Layered Filter】Dolce Calma KN95 Mask provides daily protection for you with 5 layer safety. The 5-ply KN95 face mask is comfortable with extra shield. Inner layers absorb the moisture from the breath and help facilitate easy breathing at all times. The filter efficiency of this KN95 mask is over 95%, which can protect you in the critical time.

✅【100% Satisfaction Guarantee】If for any reason you are unhappy with our product, please do not hesitate to contact us. We take full ownership and responsibility for the quality of our products and will do our best to solve your problem quickly and efficiently!
body.description: DOLCE CALMA KN95 5-PLY FACE MASK - Pack of 25 Colorful KN95 Face Masks Dolce Calma KN95 Colored Face mask now includes 25 individually wrapped Multicolor KN95 face masks; 5 count of Red / Burgundy KN95 Masks5 count of Pink KN95 Face Masks5 count of Royal Blue KN95 Face Masks5 count of Gray / Grey KN95 Face Masks5 count of Light Blue KN95 Face Masks 5 layers KN95 Face Mask Suitable for all occasions due to the colour variety Adjustable nose clip ensures a snug fit for better shield Flexible Elastic earloop design makes it breathable and comfortable

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dolce Calma Trusted and vital equipment for you and your loved ones. Choose the right gear for your family's needs. These multi-color KN95 masks are perfect for your men and women. DOLCE CALMA KN95 5-PLY FACE MASK - Pack of 25 Colorful KN95 Face Masks Dolce Calma KN95 Colored Face mask now includes 25 individually wrapped Multicolor KN95 face masks; 5 count of Red / Burgundy KN95 Masks5 count of Pink KN95 Face Masks5 count of Royal Blue KN95 Face Masks5 count of Gray / Grey KN95 Face Masks5 count of Light Blue KN95 Face Masks 5 layers KN95 Face Mask Suitable for all occasions due to the colour variety Adjustable nose clip ensures a snug fit for better shield Flexible Elastic earloop design makes it breathable and comfortable

Earloop Ear Saver Clips included within the box Each box of Dolce Calma KN95 Multi-colored masks includes 2 counts of ear loop extender clips that help with the perfect face mask fit and protect your ears. It helps to relieve the discomfort and pressure of your ears caused by wearing the mask for a long time. It can be easily adjusted according to the size of the head. 3D Compact Design for Smooth Breathing The 3D design of the KN95 Mask makes it breathable and comfortable. The elastic ear loops are perfect for different human face shapes and sizes while the adjustable nose clip ensures a tight seal for better safeguard. Individually Wrapped KN95 Masks Each colored KN95 mask in the package is individually wrapped. Made for on-the-go use so you can pack the multi-color masks into your travel bag, purse, child's school backpack, pocket, in your car, or anywhere for later use. The masks will stay intact until the next use as they are individually packed for additional hygiene and your safety.

Dolce Calma 5 Ply KN95 Masks provide 5 layers. The outer non-woven fabric layer filters out the large particles, 2 melt-blown fabric layers block more than 95% smaller particles, the non-woven fabric layer filters PM2.5 particles, and the innermost skin-friendly high-quality non-woven fabric layer serves for better breathability and comfortable wearing experience. Dolce Calma KN95 Multicolored Face Masks are suitable for different environments. The mask can be used in offices, schools, shopping malls, parks, airports, indoors, outdoors, and public places for protection against dust particles, smoke, and much more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fits my face well and very comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The normal N95s are too big for my face so based on all of the "bad" reviews stating that these were way too small, I ordered them. They're just slightly smaller than the original teal ones you see at medical facilities but they fit me perfectly. Only thing is the earloops are a smidge tight so it gets uncomfortable after a few hours (as with almost any mask that goes around the ears).I will definitely purchase more from this seller when the time comes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars These KN95 Masks are Colorful BUT the Inner Layer is NOT Very Soft
reviews.reviewText: These are definitely a "family pack" with both light & dark colors. I'll be giving away the 2 darkest colors to men. I love the 3 lighter colors. They are still reasonably priced (with me using only 15 out of 25). I love that they have EAR loops, which are much faster & easier to use, especially getting on & off (avoiding) a thick head of hair. The masks fit well enough for the way I use them, not going to crowded places, keeping safe distances at grocery & pet food stores, and staying home more than ever these days.The only drawback, imo, is the innermost layer which is NOT as soft as any other of the (made in China) KN95 masks I have purchased from other brands in stores. So I don't wear the Dolce Calma masks for more than an hour at a time, because they are a bit "scratchy" on my face/nose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Poor quality control. Some of the masks are unusable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I work in food service so these are perfect for my daily commute to and from work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent customer service
reviews.reviewText: Excellent customer service. Although the masks are a little too big for my face, I can twist the elastic string to tighten the mask around my face. Masks are comfortable and come individually wrapped. Some of the colors have a slight chemical smell which resolves within 24-48 hours after being out of the packaging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars different sizes they are not all the same
reviews.reviewText: I do not mind when the masks are different sizes in the family pack, but this time they were all too small. They also do not seem as quality as they were when i started buying them from you a couple of years ago. Are they manufactured differently lately?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Upgraded my mask game!
reviews.reviewText: With the fast spread of the omicron variant in Chicago, I was way past due to upgrade from my disposable blue masks to a KN-95 mask. These are great - good fit - well made -comfortable - individually wrapped. I could feel the difference in protection right away. My go to mask now for grocery shopping or having to do other errands in the public.
